poi.name: Sundbyberg
poi.text: Sundbyberg Municipality (Sundbybergs kommun or Sundbybergs stad) is a municipality in Stockholm County in east central Sweden, just north of the capital Stockholm. Sundbyberg is wholly within the city of Stockholm and has a 100% urban population.
poi.tts: Sundbyberg stad is a municipality in Stockholm County in east central Sweden, just north of the capital Stockholm. Sundbyberg is wholly within the city of Stockholm and has a 100% urban population.

poi.name: Evil place
poi.tts: This is a terrible place to be!
